success.introDescription: Come back daily and finish courses for more!

language.progressPopup: Most universities require an official C1 Language certificate from one of the following institutes: Goethe, DSH, TestDAF, and TELC . We will support you in the process.
language.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete it?
language.certificateDateDesc: Adding a certificate will help with your application to university.

transcriptOfRecords.descriptionSupport: Great, you already have a lot of verified courses! If you are applying for university you can request a PDF with a list of your achievements. Please contact {{orgDisplayName}} support

fileUpload.description:
Click here or drop files to upload your certificate.
(You can also upload your certificate later)
fileUpload.exampleDesc: Please click on the image to see an example of a certificate in a new tab

shortProgram.notFoundDesc: This module does not exist or does not belong to your study track. Please return to your study overview to view a list of all modules available to you.
shortProgram.certificateModule: This is a module in your online study track
shortProgram.certificateFinishText: You're on your way! <1/>Finish all the units to get a certificate.
shortProgram.noCertificateFinishText: You’re on your way! <1/>Keep up the pace!
shortProgram.removeQuestion: Are you sure you want to unenroll from this course?
shortProgram.addModuleText: This skill booster program has been added to your home tab
shortProgram.enrollModuleText: Hi {{0}}, this is part of our learning program <1>{{1}}</1>. Do you want to start it to learn about <3>{{3}}</3>?
shortProgram.rateHelp: Help other students by rating this course
shortProgram.feedbackLike: What did you like most about it?
shortProgram.feedbackDislike: What didn’t you like about it?
shortProgram.Text: Sorry, you can enroll in up to {{0}} courses

courseraProgress.title: Coursera Progress
courseraProgress.subtitle: Why isn't my Coursera progress updated on {{orgDisplayName}} Campus?
courseraProgress.body: It can take 2-3 days before your Coursera progress shows up on {{orgDisplayName}} Campus. This doesn't mean your progress isn't being tracked. Please check back soon to see your updated progress!

pendingApplicationStatus.pendingExplanation: The screening process usually takes around 2 weeks.

unitPage.completionInfo: Your instructor will mark this course as completed after review
unitPage.preventEnroll: This unit is only available after your documents have been uploaded and verified
unitPage.notificationPopupDescription: Enable notifications to get reminders for your courses.

regularMooc.notFinished: Click here if you haven't finished

messageBoard.description: Communicate with other learners, introduce yourself and get to know your fellow students here.
messageBoard.reportMessage: If you see a message that does not belong here because it seems offensive, violent or like spam, please send an email to
messageBoard.defaultText: No discussion here yet. Say hello to the other participants in this project.
messageBoard.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your message? Please note all replies will be deleted as well.
messageBoard.confirmDeleteReply: Are you sure you want to delete your reply?

verification.popupDescription: Please click on the image to see an example of a certificate in a new tab

live.allSessionsCompleted: All of your live sessions are now completed.
live.pressMarkFinished: Press "Mark as finished" to complete this unit.
live.isExpired: Registration is not possible anymore. New start dates will be published soon.
live.noSessions: There are no live sessions coming up for this unit. Please check back soon.
live.localTimeZone: All times shown are in your local timezone
live.attendConfirmationDescription01: By signing up to this live unit, you are committing to attend all of the appointments in your selected sessions.
live.attendConfirmationDescription02: Places are limited, so if you cannot attend, please do not sign up. This will allow one of your fellow students to benefit from from this unit instead.
live.cancelConfirmationDescription01: This would remove you from the list of participants in this live unit and you will not be able to access the next session
live.cancelConfirmationDescription02: If the sessions have already begun, you will not be able to enrol again until the next run
live.liveSessionLinkReminder: The link to your live session will be active here on that day.

lessonTest.passHint: Please pass the test in order to continue
lessonTest.answerHint: Answer at least {{0}} questions correctly to pass the test.
lessonTest.question: Question
lessonTest.congrats: Congratulations, you completed the lesson! You can retake the test or move on.
lessonTest.testAgain: It seems you aren’t ready to advance yet, review this one and take the test again to advance.
lessonTest.testNonRetakeable: Unfortunately, you did not reach the required score to pass this test. You can continue learning in the unit but you won't be able to mark it completed.

certificate.noFirstAndLastNameProvided: You need to provide your first and last name in order to receive a certificate.
